choices.A: Recreate the job alert as a change-based alert.
choices.C: Increase the batch job running frequency.

Microsoft FAQ for DRA:
Does the Document Routing Agent have to be installed on each computer where a user connects by using a browser?
No. Client installations of the Document Routing Agent can be shared by individuals who access the provisioned environment. We recommend that you install agents on one or more Print Servers or other domain-hosted clients that have access to network printers.

The first option should be:
"install the document routing agent on the corporate print server"

comments.content: A check printer wouldnt be on a corporate server, instead an individual basis

more over, accordingly to what Barry1981 said, in the case says:
"All printers must be exclusive to the financial legal entity."

discussion.content: Shouldn't be "Instal the DRA on the corporate print server"? In the attached link i found "We recommend that you install agents on one or more Print Servers..." in FAQ.

BCD
"Workflows are not configured for the technical support request flows in Dynamics 365 Finance." Which rules out Workflow handling.

"Management and history of technical support tickets are handled in a third-party issue management solution." which involves Business Events and External feeds

Selected Answer: BCD
BCD is correct

Selected Answer: ACE
Para activar un flujo cuando se crea una solicitud de orden de servicio técnico, puedes utilizar los siguientes tres objetos:

A. Ítems de trabajo
C. Eventos de negocio
E. Flujo de trabajo

Las opciones "B. Alertas basadas en cambios" y "D. Fuentes externas" no son válidas, ya que no se relacionan con la activación de un flujo cuando se crea una solicitud de orden de servicio técnico. Los ítems de trabajo y los eventos de negocio son objetos que pueden utilizarse para activar un flujo cuando se crea una solicitud de orden de servicio técnico, mientras que el flujo de trabajo es una herramienta que se puede utilizar para automatizar el proceso de creación de una solicitud de orden de servicio técnico.

Selected Answer: BCE
If "Flow" refers to PowerAutomate then the answers are:
B, C and E <-- all three allow you to trigger Power Automate. C directly works with PowerAutomate while B and E can create a C thereby indirectly work with Power Automate.
I know as a developer, that you can trigger a Microsoft Flow from a business event.

questions.question_text:
You need to trigger a Flow when a technical service order request is created.
Which three objects can you use? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

comments.content: sry: IT's all right EML for AR; SMTP for CServ.

discussion.content:
System Administration -> Setup -> Email -> Email Parameters
-> EML: Use an email app, such as Outlook
-> SMTP: Use the email client for Finance and Operations apps

EML for Customer Service because the use Outlook
